## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been hearing about VerusCoin and I'm curious to learn more. What is STEX.com, and how is it related to VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
STEX.com is an Estonian-based cryptocurrency exchange that has listed VerusCoin (VRSC) for live trading with a VRSC/BTC trading pair. This means that users can now buy and sell VerusCoin on the STEX.com exchange. It's a great way to get involved with VerusCoin and be a part of the community!

**User:**
That's really cool. I'd love to learn more about VerusCoin itself. What are some of the key features of VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
VerusCoin offers several advanced features that set it apart from other cryptocurrencies. For example, it has zero-knowledge privacy through VerusHash, a unique hash algorithm that can be mined on both CPUs and GPUs. It also uses a hybrid consensus mechanism that combines 50% proof of work and 50% proof of stake, with a nothing-at-stake solution to increase security and reduce power consumption. Additionally, VerusCoin has native double-spend resistance and is further protected by Komodo dPoW notarization. These features make VerusCoin a secure and efficient choice for users.

**User:**
Wow, that sounds impressive. What kind of tools and software does the Verus Coin project offer to support these features?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus Coin project offers a range of tools and software to make it easy for users to get involved. They have a GUI multi-coin wallet that allows for private messaging, built-in CPU mining and staking, client and system improvements, pool software, and lite mode servers. They're also working on a multi-coin mobile wallet, which will make it even easier to use VerusCoin on-the-go. The project is committed to providing the tools and resources users need to succeed.
What is STEX.com, and how is it related to VerusCoin?

STEX.com is an Estonian-based cryptocurrency exchange that has listed VerusCoin (VRSC) for live trading with a VRSC/BTC trading pair. This means that users can now buy and sell VerusCoin on the STEX.com exchange.

Title: STEX.com Lists VerusCoin $VRSC
Article URL: https://medium.com/veruscoin/stex-com-lists-veruscoin-vrsc-b8738c755a5e
Content:STEX.com Lists VerusCoin $VRSC
Verus Coin is now available on STEX.com for live trading with VRSC/BTC trading pairAbout STEX.com Exchange
STEX.com exchange has listed Verus with VRSC/BTC trading. The Estonian-based exchange is listed on CoinMarketCap and presently has over $1MM in 24h trading volume, placing them just under the top 100 exchanges by volume, at 114th place (as of Oct 31, 2018). Follow STEX.com for updates and news related to their Exchange on Twitter.
Please note, STEX is a “dot Com” and is found at https://www.stex.com. There you can setup a free account and begin trading VRSC with BTC.
This listing is the second exchange listing for VerusCoin, not counting decentralized exchange BarterDEX. Verus is also listed and trading in BTC and KMD pairs on DigitalPrice. Thank you to the incredible, active Verus community for coming together so promptly to cast your “vote” in favor of this listing!
About Verus
Verus offers the most advanced zero knowledge privacy available, VerusHash, the only hash algorithm that is credibly mineable on both CPUs and GPUs, 50% proof of work and 50% proof of stake with a groundbreaking nothing-at-stake solution for more security and less power consumption, and is one of the most double-spend resistant blockchains running. Although Verus Coin has native, extreme double-spend resistance, it layers Komodo dPoW notarization for even further 51% attack resistance.
The Verus Coin project also releases a GUI, multi-coin wallet that allows the sending and receiving of private messages, has built-in CPU mining and staking, client and system improvements on a regular cadence, pool software, lite mode servers, and will soon release a multi-coin mobile wallet. The Verus Coin Project developers are currently workin
